Name: Kraft Heinz
Name_1: Swift Prepared Foods readies for January opening of Columbia plant
Text_1:
Swift Prepared Foods is getting ready to begin hiring employees to work at its new Italian meats processing plant set to open next year off Paris Road in north Columbia.

Hiring efforts will ramp up in November as the plant prepares for a start date of Jan. 1 officials said Thursday.

Swift aims to have at least 200 employees at the facility.

"This will be one of Swift's largest plants at 325000 square feet and also the first of its kind producing charcuterie and Italian meats" said Garrett Fortune plant engineer. "Everything you see at stores at the deli counter."

Output is expected at 40 million pounds of meat products per year Fortune said.

Swift plans to be one of the employers available at a job fair 1-4 p.m. Thursday at Armory Sports and Recreation Center 701 E. Ash St.

More: Swift Prepared Foods selects Columbia for $200 million meat plant; plans to create 251 jobs

"As far as construction the plant is at about 80% right now and 90% to schedule. We are maintaining schedule. We got our last transformers last week" Fortune said adding the plant will now be able to start installing equipment.

The company purchased construction materials before issues related to the supply chain increasingly impacted the globe but there still were snags Fortune said. While Stellar the plant's construction contractor brought in some of its own subcontractors local subcontractors were used as well he said.

Most senior staff positions already have been hired coming either from the mid-Missouri community or a few who have relocated to Columbia.

"We have hired some highly skilled individuals in this area" Fortune said. "Also the trade schools ‚Äî we have talked to a lot. And there are a lot of robotics programs in the area and a lot of colleges investing in that. As a business that helps us quite a bit."

Human resources staff is hard at work not only preparing to hire but coordinating with other businesses along the Paris Road/Route B corridor on solutions for getting people to and from work said Tony Clark controller for the Italian food meats division of Swift.

Swift is looking into housing investments as well he said.

How Swift chose Columbia

Swift selected Columbia last year for its Italian meats plant at an 80-acre location along Paris Road next to Schneider Electric and 3M and near Kraft Heinz Aurora Organic Dairy and Quaker.

The plant will produce dry-cured meats including salami pepperoni prosciutto and pancetta.

More: These companies received Boone County Chapter 100 tax breaks. EquipmentShare could be next

Swift was approved to receive Chapter 100 tax incentive bonds from Boone County. As of last month Swift had not yet started its 10-year tax abatement period.

The $200 million facility will be the company's headquarters for Italian meat products including research and development Clark said. A second phase could bring an additional 50000-square-foot building costing $35 million.

The Chapter 100 incentive abates 75% of the company's property taxes on the new build. Property taxes of $3.7 million still are expected to be collected over the period.

Swift has received incentives from the state for its expansion in Columbia through the Missouri Works program. This incentive tool helps companies expand and retain workers by providing access to capital through withholdings or tax credits for job creation.

The company is also partnering with Missouri One Start to provide tailored recruitment assistance to meet its workforce needs.

Prior to all this Swift worked with Missouri Partnership and Austin Consulting to narrow down site selection. Missouri Partnership was the organization to make the case for Missouri said CEO Subash Alias.

The initial process was secret including with Chapter 100 using project code words before they were announced publicly. The Swift project was known as Project Silver.

Site selection "is a very calculated scientific process" Alias said. Considerations such as logistics workforce business climate and taxes go into the models created by Austin Consulting he said adding that company provided site possibilities in Missouri Kansas and Iowa down from a national list of 90 possible locations.

The Swift plant that already exists in Moberly helped boost the argument for Columbia Alias said. Another aspect that aided Swift's decision was that the Columbia location was a Missouri Certified Site.

Selection of Columbia ultimately came down to "what was offered from an operational cost perspective an economic perspective and (Regional Economic Development Inc.) put us in contact with local governments" Clark said.

"After that full bid process was done it was clear Columbia was the right choice for us."

Community programs from Swift

Swift has at least two community investment programs one of which is known as Hometown Strong through Swift's parent company JBS.

"Right now we are looking to invest $300000 and it can be for different projects" Clark said.

The other program is Better Futures which is for employees to continue their education whether at a technical or trade school or some other program Clark said.

By the time the plant is up and running the Better Futures program will be active. Swift HR staff is coordinating communications with local colleges and universities Clark said.

Employee community involvement such as with volunteerism or other community projects is determined on a plant-by-plant basis Clark said. One program already being explored is a donation avenue for the Food Bank for Central & Northeast Missouri Fortune said.

Charles Dunlap covers local government community stories and other general subjects for the Tribune. You can reach him at cdunlap@columbiatribune.com or @CD_CDT on Twitter. Please consider subscribing to support vital local journalism.
Name_2: Lunchables Now Comes in a Gummy Candy Version of the Iconic Lunchtime Staple
Text_2:
Lunchables are a fan-favorite lunchbox staple but now thanks to Frankford Candy the beloved Cracker Stackers and Pizza Kits are getting a candy twist. Frankford Candy has teamed up with Kraft Heinz to introduce new Gummy Lunchables in two varieties: Gummy Lunchable Cracker Stackers and Gummy Lunchables Pepperoni Pizza Kit. Both are available now at Five Below stores nationwide as well as Amazon.com and FrankfordCandy.com. The brand has previously launched gummy versions of Oscar Mayer Hot Dogs and Kraft Mac and Cheese as well.

"Consumers are increasingly interested in experiences with favorite food brands that they can share with family and friends and gummy candy is on fire right now" said Molly Jacobson director of business development at Frankford Candy. "Lunchables is an iconic brand that was the first to allow people to build and eat a meal their own way. We're excited to give consumers a new way to experience the brand. We think consumers will find that Gummy Lunchables are just as fun to play with as they are to indulge in."

The Gummy Lunchables are a shareable fruit-flavored reimagination of the original Lunchables products. The 6.2-ounce package of Gummy Lunchables Cracker Stackers feature eight gummy crackers and two "slices" each of gummy pepperoni gummy ham gummy Swiss cheese and gummy cheddar cheese ‚Äì enough to build four cracker stacker sandwiches. Meanwhile the Gummy Lunchables Pepperoni Pizza Kit comes in a shareable 6.3-ounce package. Each kit includes three gummy pizza crusts 12 gummy mozzarella cheese shreds 15 gummy pepperoni slices and one liquid pizza sauce packet ‚Äì enough to build three pizzas. Both varieties have a suggested retail price of $5.

"Lunchables is committed to fueling kids' creativity and inspiring them to explore the limits of their imaginations" said Samantha Mills associate director of brand communications Lunchables. "The new Gummy Lunchables provide families a completely new way to imagine build and share together. At Lunchables we believe playing with food is something to be celebrated and there's no pairing more fun than gummy candy and everyone's favorite buildable snack."

While the Gummy Lunchables are currently available at Five Below stores and Amazon.com and FrankfordCandy.com. it's expected that they will roll out to other retailers nationwide in the coming months. According to the brand there will be additional seasonal Kraft Heinz gummy offerings coming soon as well.

Will you be checking out the new Gummy Lunchables? Let us know your thoughts in the comment section!
Name_3: Minus Ben and Brady new era in Patriots-Steelers rivalry begins
Text_3:
PITTSBURGH (AP) ‚Äî For the better part of two decades the Pittsburgh Steelers and New England Patriots would meet almost annually in a rivalry heavy on stakes and star power.

Not so much in 2022.

Not with Ben Roethlisberger in retirement Tom Brady in Tampa and the two teams that defined excellence in the AFC throughout the 2000s and 2010s undergoing transitions.

When the Patriots (0-1) walk onto the Acrisure Stadium turf on Sunday to face the Steelers (1-0) it will mark the first time since 1998 that the two marquee NFL franchises face off without either Brady or Roethlisberger (or both) in the huddle.

(Or you know three months after New England quarterback Mac Jones was born. Weird right?)

"It's going to be funny the first couple plays not seeing (Brady) out there" longtime Steelers defensive end Cam Heyward said.

And maybe a relief too. Brady typically toyed with Pittsburgh beating the Steelers in the AFC championship game three times or swatting them aside during the regular season with startling regularity.

Yet the near-constant churn that embodies the modern NFL finally has shaken two teams that have long used the other as a measuring stick.

"I can't remember the last time we've gone three years without playing the Steelers" New England coach Bill Belichick said. "It seems like it's been a team we've usually played every year. Obviously it's been a little while. Some definite changes since the last time we saw them."

The Steelers have just three players ‚Äî Heyward linebacker Devin Bush and safety Terrell Edmunds ‚Äî who were in the starting lineup the last time New England and Pittsburgh met a 33-3 clinic by the Patriots in the 2019 season opener.

The turnover is just as stark in New England where Belichick is in Year 3 of the post-Brady Era trying to keep his team afloat in an AFC where the swagger that long seemed the Patriots' birthright has shifted to places like Kansas City and Buffalo.

Not so long ago Pittsburgh vs. New England forced the league to stop and watch. This is the first time since that 1998 game ‚Äî a 23-9 Patriots win ‚Äî that a regular-season contest won't be played in the late afternoon showcase window or in prime time.

New England is hoping to avoid its first 0-2 start since 2001 months before Brady took over for an injured Drew Bledsoe and began the nascent stages of what became the greatest dynasty in NFL history. The Steelers began life after Roethlisberger with a dramatic victory in Cincinnati. If they can back it up against a team and a coach that's long had their number they'd offer tangible evidence their retooling after Roethlisberger may be well ahead of schedule.

"(A win) would set us up for things to come" Edmunds said.

NO WATT

The Steelers will be without reigning NFL defensive player of the year T.J. Watt. The perennial All-Pro linebacker went on injured reserve Thursday with a left pectoral injury. Newcomers Malik Reed acquired in a trade with Denver in late August and Jamir Jones now in his second stint with Pittsburgh after being claimed off waivers on Sept. 1 will be given a chance to fill in.

"Those guys are not going to be T.J.; it's not realistic to think that they're going to be T.J." Steelers coach Mike Tomlin said. "But we expect them to be varsity."

Reed is used to replacing generational players. He made the Broncos' roster as an undrafted rookie free agent in 2019 and in 2020 found himself taking over for injured Denver edge rusher Von Miller.

"I feel like being me you know what I mean?" said Reed who had 15 sacks in three seasons with the Broncos. "I feel like I've been able to play the game at a high level when my number was called."

THE BOURNE IDENTITY

The glow from New England wide receiver Kendrick Bourne's dynamic rookie year in 2021 has faded quickly. Bournce slipped down the depth chart after a less than productive preseason that included him getting kicked out of a joint practice with Carolina for fighting.

Bourne was targeted just twice in last week's loss to Miami though he did haul in a 41-yard reception. Jones expects Bourne's role to grow in the coming weeks.

"He just has to continue to be himself" Jones said. "He's done a good job. He's a great teammate and we have a lot of guys on our team like that. I hope he can contribute more and he will and his time will come."

SLIM PICKENS?

Pittsburgh second-round pick George Pickens was the breakout star of training camp looking every bit the downfield threat the Steelers desperately needed after struggling to go deep in Roethlisberger's final seasons.

Yet Pickens had just one catch for three yards in the opener a game in which Mitch Trubisky's two longest completions came on catch-and-run tosses to tight ends Pat Freiermuth and Zach Gentry. Trubisky said he "definitely" is going to look for Pickens more regularly and thinks the deep balls will come more frequently as he settles into offensive coordinator Matt Canada's system.

"We're just going to continue to take those shots and continue to work the timing in practice" Trubisky said. "We would like to come up with those big plays."

Name_5: DOMINO'S HEINZ TOMATO KETCHUP AND HP SAUCE GET SAUCY TOGETHER WITH THE LAUNCH OF NEW BIG ...
Text_5:
Domino‚Äôs the nation‚Äôs best loved pizza company is getting saucy this September as the OG of piping hot pizza joins forces with the master of sauces ‚Äì Heinz to launch the sauciest pizza yet. Drizzled with lashings of either Heinz Tomato Ketchup or HP Sauce the question is‚Ä¶ are you red saucy or brown saucy?

Taking the classic breakfast from plate to pizza the limited-edition Big Brekkie is made with Domino‚Äôs signature fresh dough that‚Äôs hand-stretched and spoodled with vine-ripened tomato sauce before being loaded with pork sausage smoked bacon mushrooms and chunky chopped tomatoes ‚Äì sprinkled with a generous layer of 100% mozzarella cheese.

But that‚Äôs not all customers will be asked to make the ultimate decision‚Ä¶ are they team red or team brown? Whatever the choice Domino‚Äôs has it covered with either HP Sauce or Heinz Tomato Ketchup drizzled over a piping hot Big Brekkie when it comes fresh out of the oven.

This saucy creation has been specially produced by Domino‚Äôs team of innovative pizza chefs who worked hard to combine Ireland‚Äôs breakfast favourites into a delicious pizza balancing the taste perfectly. Each bite is packed with bursts of flavours made to pair perfectly with the tangy HP Sauce or the sweeter option of Heinz Tomato Ketchup. And as delicious as it is on its own for the ultimate food pairing grab the Big Brekkie pizza with a sumptuous side of potato wedges for the ultimate saucy feast.

Speaking on the launch Melanie Howe Secretary of Sauce said: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre so excited to launch our sauciest pizza yet in partnership with the master of sauces Heinz. It‚Äôs a real saucy beast and has been in the making for over a year to ensure we serve up breakfast icons only. Whether it‚Äôs HP Sauce or classic Heinz Tomato Ketchup that tickles your taste buds the Big Brekkie is guaranteed to turn up the steam and serve up all the saucy goodness!‚Äù

Chlo√© Schiltz from Kraft Heinz said: ‚ÄúLong has the nation debated on whether you put Heinz Tomato Ketchup or HP Sauce on your breakfast and we can‚Äôt wait to find out which of our sauces reigns supreme on Domino‚Äôs Big Brekkie pizza.‚Äù

The Big Brekkie pizza can be purchased as part of the Mega Deal for just ‚Ç¨25.99 you can avail of one large pizza two scrumptious sides and Domino‚Äôs delicious cookies.

The Big Brekkie pizza is available now to order online through the Domino‚Äôs app or from your nearest store. For more information head to www.dominos.ie

Name_2: Starbucks fixes big issue at in-store kiosks at Kroger ‚Äì and it could land you a new reward...
Text_2:
PERK UP Starbucks fixes big issue at in-store kiosks at Kroger ‚Äì and it could land you a new reward

KROGER customers who use in-store Starbucks kiosks will now be able to take advantage of the coffee chain's reward system.

Starbucks has become a staple in Kroger stores over the past two decades with customers enjoying the perk of grabbing a cup of coffee while they shop.

1 In-store Starbucks locations at retailers like Kroger will now allow customers to use their reward points Credit: Getty

The in-store Starbucks locations are licensed to be run by the shops which pay a percentage back to Starbucks.

But this means that customers were not able to collect Starbucks rewards points for My Starbucks Rewards - and would miss out on the chance of free drinks add-ons or food items.

This is because coffee drinkers would pay through the retailers' checkout systems meaning they couldn't earn Starbucks points.

While customers can earn points at any Starbucks stand-alone location their experiences at the retailer locations have been different depending on each store.

Read more on Starbucks COFFEE CRAVING Starbucks to make big changes in stores - and it'll speed up service

Customers might also not have been able to place orders in advance on the Starbucks app.

This issue was addressed at Starbucks Investor Day in Seattle on Tuesday.

Starbucks chief marketing officer Brady Brewer said that customers' experiences at retailer locations were "inconsistent".

To fix the problem the company created a new program called Starbucks Connect where customers at retailer locations will be able to receive their reward benefits.

"Both rewards and mobile ordering have become key to the business in recent years with accelerated growth during the pandemic" Brewer said.

These benefits go beyond the point system.

Starbucks reward members also get free refills on brewed coffee and tea after purchasing a drink as well as a free birthday treat each year.

The Starbucks Stars system is simple; you earn two stars for each dollar you spend either through the Starbucks app or with a Starbucks gift card.

You can even make points off of Starbucks K-cups premade coffee drinks or other prepackaged products that have a Stars code on them.

To add the points to your account just scan your receipt with the Starbucks app.

On Tuesday Starbucks announced it would be investing $450million to improve the efficiency of its stores.

Name_4: Kroger Store Employees May Strike Affecting Local Circleville Location
Text_4:
Circleville ‚Äì Local Circleville Kroger workers said that they have a daily conversation about what happens next after they voted down the most recent Union offer and authorized a Union strike.

A majority rejected the most recent ‚Äúlast chance offer‚Äù that the company brought to the bargaining table. The biggest hang-up is wages. The vote from the members also included the authorization for the union and its members to go on strike if a satisfactory agreement cannot be negotiated.

Approval of a strike vote doesn‚Äôt mean that Kroger employees will immediately strike but gives the Union more bargaining power when they come back to the table for the possibility of a new offer from the company.

Local Kroger employees are represented by UFCW who after the vote this week has asked Kroger to come back to the negotiation table and says that the next move is for the company to make.

Trending Video Released in Large Brawl in Chillicothe Resulting in Multiple Arrests

Kroger sent out a letter to its employees reminding them that no one wins in a strike that associates will miss out on paychecks and possible benefits and customers may stop shopping at Kroger and shop at other grocery stores that are non-union The stores could lose business and those customers may not return.

The strike vote could affect 82 stores in Ohio and 12500 employees.

Disclaimer: I the writer of this story am a previous Union negotiator that negotiated a strike vote and Union contracts for UIW Kroger Warehouse Employees. Kroger Store employees fall under a different union. In no way is my previous employment swaying my story.
Name_5: Sights and sounds from Saturday at Kroger Field
Text_5:
The Kentucky Wildcats are now 3-0 following their 31-0 victory over Youngstown State on Heroes Day.

So I thought I‚Äôd take some time to help make sure you didn‚Äôt miss anything exciting from another fun Saturday at Kroger Field!

Here‚Äôs a look at Mark Stoops and his family celebrating Stoops‚Äô record-setting win at Florida last week putting him atop UK‚Äôs all-time wins list at 61 victories since taking over in 2013 all while taking on Stoops‚Äô hometown Youngstown State team today.

Pregame recognition for @UKCoachStoops the all-time winningest football coach in UK history! pic.twitter.com/HaSiQC9t49 ‚Äî Kentucky Football (@UKFootball) September 17 2022

Our first shutout since 2009.



Highlights: Kentucky 31 Youngstown State 0. pic.twitter.com/5hmjsDvirg ‚Äî Kentucky Football (@UKFootball) September 17 2022

Chris Lewis with his first career TD as a Wildcat! #BBN @ASeaOfBlue pic.twitter.com/4xJkgFeGXU ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

True Freshman Dane Key with his third touchdown in as many games pic.twitter.com/zjQFmn9kQC ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Even UK basketball superstar Oscar Tshiebwe was in attendance.

A special cat was in attendance for Kentuckys win over Youngstown State #BBN pic.twitter.com/8RPcgaTu61 ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Myself and other media members took some time to catch up with Kentucky Coaches and Players after the 31-0 win.

Will Levis

Will Levis recaps the offensive performance and says they were good at times and bad at times.



He also breaks down his personal performances  talks about his receivers and more! #BBN ‚Å¶@ASeaOfBlue‚Å© pic.twitter.com/LcD482JSnR ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Carrington Valentine

Carrington Valentine has had back-to-back huge games.



The staff has praised him all off-season and season.



The media caught up with him after his big game! #BBN ‚Å¶@ASeaOfBlue‚Å© pic.twitter.com/NZUgsH1OPd ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Rich Scangarello

Offensive Coordinator Rich Scangarello is NOT happy with the offense or the fumbles‚Ä¶ @ASeaOfBlue #BBN pic.twitter.com/BWT8fpsuY7 ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Dane Key

Freshman Star Dane Key says despite his third straight game with a touchdown there is room for improvement for the offense! pic.twitter.com/XeIBZsQSm7 ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Brad White

Defensive Coordinator Brad White talks about players he is looking to step if JJ Weaver is to miss anytime! pic.twitter.com/Yn2VoeHKky ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

And some more photos from the day.

Pregame with the Cats pic.twitter.com/MhKmFm5M0j ‚Äî Dylan Ballard (@DylanBallard_UK) September 17 2022

Outside of a few fumbles interceptions and injuries it was fun day in Lexington. Fans can now look forward to Northern Illinois under the lights next week as the Cats will kick off at 7 pm ET next Saturday at Kroger Field.

Name: Lamb Weston
Name_1: Oregon State and partners will receive $50 million grant to develop climate-smart potatoes
Text_1:
CORVALLIS Ore. ‚Äì Oregon State University has been awarded a $50 million grant from the U.S. Department of Agriculture to work with farmers and Native American Tribes on cropping practices that can enhance soil health and reduce the carbon footprint of the Pacific Northwest potato industry.

Oregon State University is collaborating with the University of Idaho and Washington State University Tribal nations commodity groups and potato processing businesses on the five-year project that funded under the USDA‚Äôs Partnerships for Climate-Smart Commodities program.

It is one of 70 projects totaling up to $2.8 billion funded by the USDA to support America‚Äôs farmers ranchers and forest owners and to strengthen U.S. rural and agricultural communities by building markets for what the USDA is calling climate-smart commodities meaning implanting green and climate resilient practices in food and agriculture.

‚ÄúOregon State University is privileged to take part in this once in a lifetime opportunity to help the potato industry Native American tribes and other crop producers of all sizes and kinds be part of a national solution to climate challenges‚Äù said Jeffrey Steiner project leader and associate director of the OSU Global Hemp Innovation Center.

More than 62% of U.S. potatoes are grown in Oregon Washington and Idaho and they have an economic value of $2.2 billion annually according to USDA statistics. Nearly 500000 acres of potatoes are grown in the three-state region.

Potato production typically uses practices that greatly disturb the soil particularly at harvest so organic matter does not build up and greenhouse gases are lost to the atmosphere project leaders said. This project is designed to assist farmers who want to use soil health building practices that result in climate-smart outcomes.

Oregon State and collaborators at universities and the Soil Health Institute a nonprofit based in North Carolina will focus on how climate-smart practices and rotation crops grown with potatoes those crops produced in the three years between potato crop production years can offset the effects of the soil-disturbing practices. Rotation crops include cereal grains alfalfa corn hemp and onions. Climate-smart practices include reduced tillage seedings use of cover crops and mulching residues.

The researchers believe using the proper combinations of these techniques could significantly increase soil organic matter reduce soil nutrient losses and improve the water holding capacity of the soil ‚Äì improvements that increase soil health save water and lead to climate-smart outcomes.

The project team will assess how potatoes and rotation crops are currently being grown on conventional and organic farms and Native Americans lands. By studying what is presently being done and measuring the soil conditions of fields at the beginning of the project the team will then work with the farmers and Tribal leaders will work to identify soil health building practices and rotation options that work for their farms and land conditions.

The effects of the changes will be monitored by measuring soil data. The data will be used in models to verify the approaches are working. Participating farmers and Native American Tribes will receive incentive payments to offset the initial costs of adopting climate-smart practices and to reduce the risks of early-adoption expenses.

‚ÄúWe want to provide potato and other farmers incentives for finding climate-smart practices that make sense for them and their farm conditions‚Äù Steiner said.

The project will also help develop ways to market and promote climate-smart potatoes and other crops. Some of the producers envision selling branded consumer products that could provide a climate-smart premium to participating farmers and processors.

Those working with OSU University of Idaho and Washington State researchers and Extension specialists on the project are the Soil Health Institute LoCo+ 7 Generations LLC Industrial Hemp Association of Washington Yakima Nation: Confederated Tribes and Bands Nez Perce Tribe Lamb Weston Frito-Lay Threemile Canyon Farms Mart Produce Simplot Marc Staunton Scotty Fenters GMP Orchards LLC Selkirk Ag LLC and Triangle Ranch.

Name_1: Escritor Augusto Borja presenta segunda parte de su novela "La hora no marcada"
Text_1:
Con esta segunda entrega el escritor salvadore√±o Augusto Borja pretende cerrar el ciclo que inici√≥ con su √≥pera prima en 2016. Ambas novelas ya est√°n disponibles en formato digital y f√≠sico.

Por √ìscar Orellana | Sep 18 2022- 15:44

Augusto Borja es el autor de ‚ÄúLa hora no marcada‚Äù novela hist√≥rica con la que debut√≥ como escritor salvadore√±o en 2016 la cual durante mucho tiempo fue considerada por Amazon uno de los 100 textos m√°s le√≠dos de dicha plataforma.

Seis a√±os despu√©s el novelita cuscatleco regresa con un relanzamiento en forma de ‚Äúd√∫o pack‚Äù de esta ic√≥nica obra. Se trata de su segunda parte titulada ‚ÄúFugitivo‚Äù.

Y es que Augusto se ha destacado por retratar la vida de un El Salvador en su √©poca de esplendor ubicando al lector en las d√©cadas de los 50 y 60. Adem√°s en su amplia carrera como escritor ya cuenta con cinco libros en su mayor√≠a dentro del g√©nero de la novela hist√≥rica.

Con reconocidos personajes de la sociedad salvadore√±a como Maribel Arrieta virreina en Miss Universo 1955; Enrique √Ålvarez C√≥rdova o Lilian D√≠az Sol ‚ÄúLa hora no marcada‚Äù revive la arquitectura el glamour las costumbres y el estilo de vida imperante de un pa√≠s que despierta la nostalgia.

Sigue leyendo: Obra de artistas salvadore√±os se visibilizar√° en galer√≠a digital

Portada de ‚ÄúLa hora no marcada‚Äù (2016). Foto: cortes√≠a Augusto Borja

El texto est√° basado en un hecho real sucedido en la capital salvadore√±a en la d√©cada de los 60s. Con algunos elementos de ficci√≥n y otros de un minucioso cuido hist√≥rico la obra se centra en la historia de Mar√≠a Rene√© Mel√©ndez Bengoa hija de un alto militar salvadore√±o a quien la vida le lleva a encontrarse con su antagonista el cadete guatemalteco Ruiz Trevi√±o.

Por lo tanto el amor las traiciones el espionaje y la sombra de la guerra fr√≠a son parte de los temas que hacen que la novela capte la atenci√≥n del lector y los introduzca en un mundo lleno de contrastes.

Mientras que con el surgimiento de su segunda parte ‚ÄúFugitivo‚Äù la novela se vuelve a√∫n m√°s interesante y cautivadora ya que el personaje de Ruiz Trevi√±o pasa de ser el antagonista para convertirse en el actor principal de una red de intrigas secretos y espionaje en el fragor de la guerra fr√≠a en Europa.

‚ÄúCon esta novela Augusto Borja pretende cerrar el ciclo que inici√≥ con "La hora no marcada" su √≥pera prima en 2016 esta vez cae el tel√≥n y todo el sigilo y las interrogantes quedan develadas‚Äù revela el comunicado de prensa.

Lee: ¬øPor qu√© funciona envolver aguacates en papel peri√≥dico?

‚ÄúFugitivo‚Äù segunda parte de la novela hist√≥rica. Foto: cortes√≠a Augusto Borja

Te puede interesar: Sinf√≥nica Juvenil enfrenta embargo ante falta de fondos que le adeuda Alcald√≠a

Seg√∫n el autor en este mes de septiembre ambas novelas llegaron en una presentaci√≥n de ‚Äúd√∫o pack‚Äù y ya se encuentran disponibles en la Librer√≠a de la UCA tanto en SOHO Las Cascadas como en la sucursal del alma mater.

De igual manera se pueden adquirir con un precio muy especial en Karcher Center ubicado en 25 Avenida Sur #752 frente a Banco Cuscatl√°n.

Asimismo las personas interesadas en leerlas pueden comprarlas por medio de la plataforma Amazon donde se encuentra disponible en formato digital.
Name_2: 'Literalh': Encuentros con los escritores Elvira Lindo Lorenzo Silva y Javier Cercas
Text_2:
Alhaur√≠n de la Torre acoger√° otro gran encuentro literario con destacado escritores nacionales en este caso Elvira Lindo Lorenzo Silva y Javier Cercas. Esta importante cita cultural bautizada como ‚ÄòLiteralh‚Äô tendr√° lugar los d√≠as 16 y 17 de septiembre en las instalaciones de La Platea de la calle Goleta.

Durante la tarde del viernes y buena parte del s√°bado se han programado una serie de coloquios charlas y entrevistas con los tres escritores. La iniciativa est√° organizada por la Concejal√≠a de Biblioteca y Eme de Mar Cultura en colaboraci√≥n con la Diputaci√≥n de M√°laga.

La entrada ser√° libre y gratuita. El Ayuntamiento ha dise√±ado la actividad como un fin de semana dedicado a la literatura la cultura en general y las obras de estos escritores pero con protagonismo tambi√©n para los lectores. No en vano Elvira Lindo Javier Cercas y Lorenzo Silva son tres de los autores m√°s le√≠dos en Espa√±a.
Name_3: Los mejores 65 libros gratis para leer con Kindle Unlimited en Amazon M√©xico: George Orwell 'Harry...
Text_3:
Kindle Unlimited o el Netflix de los e-books es un servicio de libros por cat√°logo en el cual pagaremos una suscripci√≥n para tener acceso a m√°s de un mill√≥n de libros para leer hacer anotaciones descargarlos para acceder a ellos de manera offline y leer en cualquier parte.

Y apenas les contamos que actualmente este servicio tiene una promoci√≥n con la cual obtendremos hasta dos meses gratuitos del servicio para poderlo probar y asegurarnos de que realmente valga la pena.

Prueba Amazon Prime gratis durante un mes PVP en Amazon M√©xico ‚Äî $0.00 * Alg√∫n precio puede haber cambiado desde la √∫ltima revisi√≥n

Y si sigues con la duda acerca de si vale o no la pena Kindle Unlimited En Xataka Selecci√≥n te traemos una lista con 15 libros recomendados para aprovechar al m√°ximo este servicio.

¬øC√≥mo leer en Kindle Unlimited?

Es importante mencionar que para tener acceso a estos libros podemos hacerlo desde la aplicaci√≥n de Kindle disponible tanto para iOS como para Android.

Sin embargo si deseas tener una experiencia m√°s cercana al papel tradicional con una sincronizaci√≥n autom√°tica y al instante y con un dispositivo duradero lo ideal es adquirir algunos de los dispositivos Kindle:

'La era de los razonables' - H√©ctor Melicoff

A fines del a√±o 2009 una pareja de cient√≠ficos rusos llegan a la B√≥veda Global de Semillas en la isla de Svalbard Noruega. Fingiendo ser estadounidenses entran y salvan de momento su preciado cargamento. Antes de huir env√≠an una se√±al de auxilio que conf√≠an ser√° escuchada. A miles de kil√≥metros de ah√≠ en Washington Katherine Southwood famosa reportera ca√≠da en desgracia recibe en su Blackberry algunos mensajes misteriosos y un archivo encriptado. En otra parte de Estados Unidos Alice Williams es informada sobre la llegada de una serie de correos electr√≥nicos entre ellos un acertijo. Es tiempo de enfrentarse al enemigo lo sabe primero tiene que encontrar al signatario de aquellas misivas.

'El casi de lo que pudimos ser' - Micaela Gonz√°lez Britez

El presente libro nos trae distintas historias de amor de encuentros y desencuentros. Descubre a los personajes de este viaje hacia el coraz√≥n y encuentra su relaci√≥n con la psicolog√≠a; encontrar√°s informaci√≥n sobre el enamoramiento la responsabilidad afectiva el apego la dependencia emocional la resiliencia la ansiedad y mucho m√°s.

Estas son historias nacidas del coraz√≥n una compilaci√≥n de historias reales mezcladas con ficci√≥n.

En cada una de ellas hay algo en com√∫n: Todas fueron un casi  de algo que pudo ser.

'Harry Potter y la piedra filosofal' - J.K. Rowling

Con las manos temblorosas Harry le dio la vuelta al sobre y vio un sello de lacre p√∫rpura con un escudo de armas: un le√≥n un √°guila un tej√≥n y una serpiente que rodeaban una gran letra H. Harry Potter nunca hab√≠a o√≠do nada sobre Hogwarts cuando las cartas comienzan a caer en el felpudo del n√∫mero cuatro de Privet Drive. Escritas en tinta verde en un pergamino amarillento con un sello morado sus horribles t√≠os las han confiscado velozmente. En su und√©cimo cumplea√±os un hombre gigante de ojos negros llamado Rubeus Hagrid aparece con una noticia extraordinaria: Harry Potter es un mago y tiene una plaza en el Colegio Hogwarts de Magia y Hechicer√≠a. ¬°Una aventura incre√≠ble est√° a punto de empezar!

'Pedro P√°ramo' - Juan Rulfo

Desconcertante lista a inquietar a la cr√≠tica est√° ya en los escaparates la primera novela de Juan Rulfo Pedro P√°ramo que transcurre en una serie de transposiciones on√≠ricas ahondando m√°s all√° de la muerte de sus personajes que uno no sabe en qu√© momento son sue√±o vida f√°bula verdad pero a los que se les oye la voz al trav√©s de la perspicacia despiadada y certera de tan sin duda extraordinario escritor". Con estas palabras iniciaba Edmundo Vald√©s la primera rese√±a de Pedro P√°ramo aparecida el 30 de marzo de 1955 y conservada por Juan Rulfo entre sus papeles.

'Traiciones y Sirenas: Un Cuento de Hadas Versi√≥n Adulta' - Lynda Menova

Traiciones y Sirenas no es solo un cuento de hadas es un cuento de hadas versi√≥n para adultos dado que toca el tema de las sirenas m√°s no en su forma humanoide si no que se trata de una versi√≥n m√°s real. Se trata de un animal marino que hoy en d√≠a yace extinto pero antiguamente est√° fue la versi√≥n m√°s exacta de como luc√≠an las sirenas verdaderamente. La autora llama a esta versi√≥n de sirenas "Manant√≠n" puesto que de esta forma los llamaba su abuela.

'La chica que lo ten√≠a todo' - Jessica Knoll

Como estudiante en la prestigiosa escuela Bradley Ani FaNelli no pas√≥ la mejor de las adolescencias. Ahora con un trabajo glamuroso un armario caro y un apuesto novio est√° tan cerca de vivir la vida perfecta y fr√≠vola por la que ha estado trabajando tan duro. Pero Ani tiene un secreto. Hay algo en su pasado que todav√≠a la persigue: algo privado oculto secreto y doloroso que amenaza con destruirlo todo.

'Coraline' - Neil Gaiman

Cuando Coraline atraviesa una de las puertas de la casa nueva de su familia se encuentra que hay otra casa extra√±amente similar a la suya (aunque la nueva sea definitivamente mejor). Al principio todo parece maravilloso: la comida es m√°s sabrosa que la de casa y el caj√≥n de los juguetes est√° repleto de angelitos de papel que vuelan solos y de calaveras de dinosaurios que parecen vivas y se arrastran haciendo casta√±etear los dientes. Pero resulta que hay otra madre que vive ah√≠ y otro padre y quieren que Coraline se quede con ellos y se convierta en su peque√±a. Quieren cambiarla y no dejarla ir jam√°s. Coraline tendr√° que enfrentarse a ellos con todo su ingenio y las herramientas que encuentre si es que ha de conseguir salvarse y volver a su vida normal.

'El lenguaje de las uvas' - Pilar G. Simarro

El lenguaje de las uvas: nacer crecer vivir y amar en uni√≥n con la Tierra. Rom√°n padre de Mateo y de Mar√≠a no se ha recuperado de la p√©rdida de Eva. Un d√≠a coincide con la joven escritora Paula la esposa de su amigo Manu. √âl no la reconoce y la deja plantada. Pero despu√©s el destino con su tiran√≠a los unir√° en una dif√≠cil y compleja in extremis promesa. Una historia de sentimientos encontrados amor venganzas superaci√≥n y segundas oportunidades donde Paula y Rom√°n ¬øfranquear√°n los obst√°culos y recorrer√°n juntos el camino de regreso a casa? ¬øSus hijos querr√°n acompa√±arlos? ¬øLos dem√°s se resignar√°n con ese final?

'Venganza' - Elisabeth Green

Cuando aquel d√≠a fue a trabajar esperando que su mujer embarazada le llamara en cualquier momento dici√©ndole que se hab√≠a puesto de parto no esperaba que el d√≠a terminara as√≠. Al llegar a casa descubre que su mujer ha desaparecido todas sus pertenencias est√°n all√≠ tampoco hay rastros de ninguna agresi√≥n ni puertas o ventanas forzadas. Nadie parece haberla visto. No hay huellas no hay pistas. Meses despu√©s sigue desaparecida y su vuelta al trabajo le depara otra sorpresa. La aparici√≥n del cuerpo de una joven y el de un hombre mutilado convertir√°n al tranquilo pueblo donde nunca pasa nada en un lugar peligroso que alberga un s√°dico asesino. El inspector sospecha que puede ser el mismo que se llev√≥ a su mujer y comenzar√° una exhaustiva investigaci√≥n para encontrarle y saber qu√© le pas√≥.

'La hermana ausente' - Kendra Elliot

Hace veinte a√±os Emily Mills encontr√≥ el cad√°ver de su padre ahorcado en el jard√≠n de casa. Su hermana menor Madison sostuvo que ella dorm√≠a en su habitaci√≥n. Su hermana mayor Tara afirm√≥ que hab√≠a salido con una amiga. Aunque la polic√≠a detuvo al asesino y cerr√≥ el caso la tragedia arrastr√≥ a su madre al suicidio y llev√≥ a Tara a abandonar la familia. Desde entonces Emily y Madison han seguido adelante con sus vidas e intentado olvidar lo que ocurri√≥ esa noche hasta que un doble asesinato resucita sus recuerdos. El encargado de la investigaci√≥n es el agente especial del FBI Zander Wells cuyos esfuerzos por resolver el horrible crimen se cruzan con el misterioso asesinato del padre de Emily y su pasado.

'El invierno m√°s largo' - Cecilia Ekb√§ck

Maija una campesina finlandesa que vive con su familia en una monta√±a aislada de Suecia decide investigar por su cuenta un asesinato y una serie de misteriosos acontecimientos que todos quieren ocultar.

Una mezcla deEl pianoyThe Killingen la Suecia del siglo XVIII.

'El retiro' - Mark Edwards

Hace dos a√±os Julia perdi√≥ a su familia en un tr√°gico accidente: su marido muri√≥ ahogado tratando de salvar a la hija de ambos en el r√≠o que discurre junto a su casa. Pero lo cierto es que el cad√°ver de la peque√±a Lily nunca se encontr√≥. Destrozada por el dolor Julia est√° convencida de que su hija a√∫n sigue viva en alguna parte. Sola y desconsolada Julia convierte su casa en un retiro literario para escritores. Uno de los primeros hu√©spedes es Lucas autor de novelas de terror que empieza a obsesionarse con descubrir qu√© le ocurri√≥ a la ni√±a. Pero a los pocos d√≠as de su llegada una serie de misteriosos y espeluznantes episodios quiebra la paz del retiro.

'La tumba de Sarah' - Robert Dugoni

Hace veinte a√±os que Sarah desapareci√≥. Desde entonces su hermana Tracy duda de que el violador que cumple condena por su asesinato Edmund House sea realmente el responsable de aquel crimen. Esa intriga unida a la voluntad de hacer justicia la ha empujado a hacerse detective de homicidios de la polic√≠a de Seattle. Cuando por fin aparecen los restos de Sarah cerca de la ciudad donde crecieron Tracy buscar√° sin descanso las respuestas que la ocupan desde hace tanto tiempo. La persecuci√≥n del verdadero asesino la llevar√° a desenterrar antiguos y oscuros secretos que transformar√°n por completo su relaci√≥n con el pasado... y la expondr√°n a peligros mortales.

'1984' - George Orwell

1984 es el √∫ltimo libro escrito por Orwell publicado un a√±o antes de su muerte en 1950. En √©l proyectaba un futuro dist√≥pico donde se presentaba una sociedad estrictamente controlada por un totalitarismo extremo y un individuo que empieza a pensar por s√≠ mismo replante√°ndose el sistema vigente. Aunque la fecha se haya superado con Internet como una versi√≥n inmaterial del Gran Hermano el creciente poder de las grandes corporaciones cada vez m√°s poderosas y globalizadas y la capacidad de control y recopilaci√≥n de informaci√≥n que representan las nuevas tecnolog√≠as que suponen a la vez un medio de difusi√≥n de proclamas de mansajes velados y fake news mantienen la vigencia del relato de Orwell. Un libro trepidante que entretiene y conciencia a partes iguales.

'La Relatividad de Perder' - Diana Glez

"La Relatividad de Perder" es un viaje de ida. Aqu√≠ Diana Glez nos demuestra que si bien existe el riesgo de perder cuando se ama ninguna p√©rdida est√° exenta de proezas y menos cuando se tiene un talento que convierte al dolor y a la ausencia en vertientes de palabras llenas de una carga ingente de sentimientos y belleza l√≠rica. Eso es en esencia de lo que se trata la relatividad en el hecho de perder: cuando el amor se va llegan los poemas llega el arte a embellecer las ruinas y ponerles ung√ºento a las heridas. Porque Diana sabe que no siempre se trata de sanar sino de convertir el dolor en una oportunidad para tocar almas y decirles que no est√°n solas que a√∫n hay esperanza de resurgir m√°s fuertes con una luz de sabidur√≠a en la mirada. Y es que cuando una poeta pierde en el amor siempre gana la poes√≠a y el perder entonces se convierte en triunfo. Este libro es prueba de ello.

M√°s libros para disfrutar

En Xataka M√©xico Selecci√≥n publicamos las mejores ofertas en tecnolog√≠a videojuegos coleccionables y dem√°s categor√≠as que est√©n en descuento en distintas tiendas en l√≠nea de M√©xico. El precio y disponibilidad del producto est√°n sujetos a cambios sin previo aviso.

Algunos de los enlaces de esta publicaci√≥n pueden pertenecer a un programa de afiliados. Ninguno de los art√≠culos mencionados han sido propuestos ni por las marcas ni por las tiendas siendo su introducci√≥n una decisi√≥n √∫nica del equipo de editores.
Name_4: 6 c√≥mics de Batman que todo fan deber√≠a haber le√≠do
Text_4:
Batman es uno de los personajes m√°s ic√≥nicos de la editorial DC Comics y sin duda ha dejado grandes historias para el recuerdo

Aqu√≠ nuestras 6 particulares recomendaciones de los que consideramos que todo fan deber√≠a leer

Batman es uno de los personajes m√°s ic√≥nicos del mundo del c√≥mic y uno de los superh√©roes bandera de la editorial DC Comics desde el nacimiento del personaje hace nada menos que 76 a√±os en todo este tiempo se han publicado obras excepcionales en las que han participado una infinidad de artistas y guionistas y aunque es imposible enumerarlas todas aqu√≠ os dejo mis cinco c√≥mics favoritos del murci√©lago y que de alguna manera estas historias han servido para definir la personalidad del personaje y han sido determinante en las siguientes historias que se publicaron a partir de ellas.

N√∫mero 27 de Detective comics

Empezamos como no con la primera aparici√≥n del murci√©lago en mayo de 1939 en el n√∫mero 27 de Detective comics lo que hoy conocemos como DC. El personaje fue creado por Bob Kane y Bill Finger aunque a este √∫ltimo nunca se le reconoci√≥ como creador del mismo.

De la primera historia de Batman El Caso del Sindicato Qu√≠mico Finger declar√≥ que el argumento pertenece al g√©nero pulp de las revistas populares una evidente influencia que se halla impl√≠cita en la personalidad del personaje: sentir poco remordimiento a causa de sus asesinatos cometidos sin involucrar ning√∫n arma de fuego. El √©xito de su publicaci√≥n le report√≥ la creaci√≥n de su propia revista (Batman) en 1940 mientras segu√≠a apareciendo en Detective Comics. En ese entonces National Publications era la empresa l√≠der en las ventas de historietas siendo considerada como la m√°s popular y reconocida en la industria; Batman y Superman se hab√≠an convertido en sus ¬´h√©roes estelares¬ª. A finales de 1940 se introdujo a ambos personajes en la nueva serie World‚Äôs Finest Comics en la que Jerry Robinson y Dick Sprang trabajaban como colaboradores.

El regreso del caballero Oscuro (Batman: The Dark Knight Returns)

Seguimos con nuestro repaso con El regreso del caballero Oscuro (Batman: The Dark Knight Returns) de Frank Miller toda una obra de culto en el mundo del c√≥mic esta genial obra maestra supuso el resurgimiento del personaje tras a√±os de declive y no solo ha sido adaptada en forma de pel√≠cula animada (Tambi√©n muy recomendable) sino que tambi√©n ha servido a Zack Snyder como inspiraci√≥n para su ‚ÄòBatman v Superman: El amanecer de la justicia‚Äô.

El maestro Miller describe un futuro alternativo de Batman donde Bruce Wayne ha abandonado el manto del murci√©lago tras vivir varias desgracias personales. El regreso del Caballero Oscuro ahonda en los motivos que llevan a Bruce a volver a enfundarse el traje que tanto le cost√≥ dejar ayudado por una nueva Robin que interrumpe en su vida. A su vuelta le sigue de forma inevitable el regreso de villanos como Joker y Dos Caras que sirven como antesala al enfrentamiento final contra el propio gobierno de Estados Unidos y hasta el mism√≠simo Superman.

Batman A√±o: Uno

Batman A√±o: Uno. En 1987 y tras el enorme √©xito de The Dark Knight Returns de nuevo Frank Miller junto al dibujante David Mazzucchelli nos trae otro de los t√≠tulos imprescindibles del personaje una reinterpretaci√≥n del origen de Batman: qui√©n es y c√≥mo lleg√≥ a serlo. A√±o Uno establece el escenario para una nueva versi√≥n de un personaje legendario. El c√≥mic tambi√©n lleg√≥ en forma de pel√≠cula animada producida por Bruce Timm y dirigida por Lauren Montgomery y Sam Liu. Christopher Nolan se inspir√≥ en Batman A√±o: Uno para su primera pel√≠cula del murci√©lago.

El largo Halloween

Una obra maestra a los l√°pices del recientemente fallecido Tim Sale con guion de Jeph Loeb. En El largo Halloween no encontramos al cruzado de la capa mostrando sus habilidades detectivescas tratando de descubrir la identidad de Festivo un misterioso homicida que aprovechando fechas se√±aladas del calendario para cometer sus asesinatos. Con las familias criminales de Gotham en pie de guerra Batman tan solo contar√° con la ayuda de James Gordon y Harvey Dent para resolver este caso.

Esta serie de c√≥mics fue utilizada como fuente de inspiraci√≥n por el director y guionista Matt Reeves para escribir su pel√≠cula The Batman con Robert Pattinson como protagonista. Tambi√©n podemos encontrar una adaptaci√≥n de El largo Halloween en forma de pel√≠cula animada dividida en dos partes. Tambi√©n muy recomendable.

La broma asesina (The Killing Joke)

La broma asesina (The Killing Joke). Publicado en 1988 con guion de Alan Moore y dibujos de Brian Bolland es sin duda y a pesar de ser una historia dedicada al archi enemigo de Batman uno de los comics imprescindibles de toda biblioteca y por ende de cualquier seguidor del universo Batman. En √©l Alan Moore cuenta a modo de flashbacks un posible origen del Joker como un triste ingeniero/comediante y padre de familia que perdi√≥ todo en unas pocas horas llev√°ndolo a enloquecer. Este origen est√° basado en el c√≥mic El hombre de la capucha roja (Detective Comics N¬∫ 168 febrero de 1951). A√±adir que La broma asesina tambi√©n conocer√° una adaptaci√≥n en forma de pel√≠cula animada y que Jared Leto que interpreta a Joker ha hecho una infinidad de gui√±os al c√≥mic durante el rodaje de la pel√≠cula Suicide Squad de David Ayer.

Batman a Death in the Family (Una muerte en la familia)

Sin duda los 80 fueron una de las mejores etapas que ha conocido el personaje de Batman a lo largo de su historia. En 1988 DC comics avalada por los enormes √©xitos cosechados p√∫blica Una muerte en la familia y decide realizar un experimento donde los lectores deb√≠an decidir la suerte de Jason Todd (el segundo Robin) tras un encuentro con el Joker. En ella deb√≠an decidir nada m√°s ni nada menos si Jason Todd viv√≠a o por el contrario morir√≠a en manos del JOKER; la suerte no estuvo del lado de Todd donde 5.343 lectores bajaron el dedo cual circo romano decidiendo as√≠ su destino. Este hecho tuvo un gran impacto en el personaje de Batman tanto como la muerte de sus padres.

En 2005 el personaje de Jason Todd regresar√≠a al universo de DC como h√©roe que combate el crimen de forma violenta convertido en Capucha Roja (curiosamente la identidad que tuvo su verdugo antes de convertirse en JOKER). Una recomendaci√≥n no dej√©is de ver el largometraje de animaci√≥n Batman: Under the Red Hood.

El c√≥mic cont√≥ con el guion de Jim Starlin y dibujo de Jim Aparo. En la trama Jason descubre que su verdadera madre est√° viva y comienza su b√∫squeda por el Medio Oriente donde se re√∫ne con Batman quien est√° tras la pista del Joker. Jason conoce a su madre quien est√° involucrada en negocios con el Joker pero √©ste finalmente la traiciona golpea a Jason hasta dejarlo moribundo y los deja a ambos encerrados con explosivos.

Batman: Knightfall

Y para finalizar este repaso no podemos dejarnos en el tintero Batman: Knightfall publicado en 1993 con guion de Chuck Dixon y Doug Moench con las ilustraciones de Jim Aparo Norm Breyfogle Graham Nolan y Jim Balent. En El Caballero Oscuro: La leyenda renace no solo podemos ver a Bane sino que Christopher Nolan hace gui√±o a este c√≥mic incluyendo la famosa escena de Bane quebrando al murci√©lago.

En Batman: Knightfall (La Ca√≠da del Murci√©lago) Batman termina paralitico tras su enfrentamiento con Bane. Un nuevo personaje Azrael sustituye a nuestro h√©roe durante su recuperaci√≥n para combatir el crimen pero este atra√≠do por el poder de Batman termina convirti√©ndose en una amenaza. Una vez recuperado Bruce Wayne debe enfrentarse a Azrael y volver a ocupar el sitio que le pertenece.

Este es un ranking particular. Por lo que te invito a que comentes cont√°ndonos cuales son tus favoritos.

Name: Lennar
Name_1: Town OKs 1 annexation starts another
Text_1:
McCORDSVILLE ‚Äî Officials in McCordsville approved an annexation for a proposed housing development and have started the process on another.

Hartman Capital a real estate investment firm in Champaign Illinois is pursuing a development called Meridian Homes at Sycamore Drive on over 68 acres south of CR 650N and east of CR 700W. Plans call for a fully managed community of 153 single-family rental homes. Lennar is the builder. Homes will have three to four bedrooms two to two and a half bathrooms and two-car attached garages. Exterior materials will be masonry and fiber cement siding.

Town council members earlier this month approved annexing the land into town and rezoning the site to a planned unit development.

The council also approved an annexation on first reading for Alexander Ridge which St. John-based Olthof Homes is planning on about 48 acres on the south side of CR 900N about a half-mile east of Mt. Comfort Road. It would have 61 single-family homes and 66 villas. It would not be a rental community. The town‚Äôs plan commission is slated to have a public hearing and consider zoning for the site during its meeting at 6:30 p.m. Oct. 18 at Town Hall 6280 W. 800N McCordsville.

Name: Live Nation Entertainment
Name_1: Philadelphia unveils ‚Äò21st Century‚Äô workforce initiative at three high schools
Text_1:
The program called the 21st Century Schools Model will provide ‚Äúlife-changing opportunities and life-changing outcomes for students and their families‚Äù Superintendent Tony Watlington said during a Thursday press conference at Overbrook.

Watlington described the initiative as a key part of achieving his goal to make Philadelphia the fastest-improving large school district in the nation regarding student achievement. Watlington noted that the district‚Äôs open enrollment policy allows students outside the schools‚Äô catchment to enroll if this pathway interests them.

‚ÄúSchools share the responsibility to help companies recruit onboard support and develop the talent namely our students‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIn order to build a healthy diverse and more equitable pipeline of skilled labor that supports both our local economy and economy of the future we need pipelines like this that provide our young people with the instruction awareness exposure and experience to support whatever pathway they choose when they graduate.‚Äù

However he added while he believes that talent is equally distributed among Philadelphia students ‚Äúaccess and exposure to resources are not equitably distributed.‚Äù

The district also wants to eventually expand the program to other neighborhood high schools in the city he said.

Officials at Thursday‚Äôs press conference did not provide a price tag for the 21st Century Schools Model. They also stressed that students participating in the new model will still need to accumulate the 23.5 credits required for high school graduation and the goal is for all of them to be ready for college as well as careers.

Ali Robinson-Roberts the district‚Äôs deputy chief of postsecondary readiness said the program allows students to make a closer connection between the work they do in school and their future careers combining ‚Äústudent engagement with academic rigor.‚Äù

Overbrook Principal Kahlila Johnson herself a 1989 graduate of the school said that Overbrook ‚Äî the actor Will Smith‚Äôs alma mater ‚Äî already has partnerships with several local companies and organizations. These include DASH a nonprofit that exposes students to the entertainment industry; Live Nation and Live Nation Urban which run entertainment venues; and the Mann Center for the Performing Arts.

The new model she said would help the school seek out and develop more such partnerships.

Johnson said experiences Overbrook already provides also increase students‚Äô desire to attend school which has a ‚Äúrich history‚Äù in music and the arts and is a beacon for the community looking to provide students access to those fields.
